2016 - Report on Illegal Conversions of Dwelling Units from Permanent Residences

Summary: This bill would require the Department of Buildings to submit an annual report to the Council on illegal conversions of dwelling units for other than permanent residence purposes.

\pard\ltrpar\noline\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl480\slmult1\qj\expndtw-3\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl480\slmult1\qj\ulnone\tab Section 1. Chapter 2 of title 28 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 28-210.3.1 to read as follows:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\expndtw0\ul\b\'a7 28-210.3.1 Reporting on illegal conversions of dwelling units from permanent residences.\b0  By no later than September 1 of each year, the department shall, with the cooperation of the mayor\rquote s office of special enforcement and all other relevant city agencies,  submit a report to the council including, but not limited to, the following information for the previous year, disaggregated by council district:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\qj 1.  The number of complaints received by the department alleging the conversion of dwelling units for other than permanent residence purposes;\par
\par
2. \tab The number of inspections conducted by the city in response to suspected conversions of dwelling units for other than permanent residence purposes;\par
\par
3. \tab The number of notices of violation issued for conversions of dwelling units for other than permanent residence purposes;\par
\par
4. \tab The amount of civil penalties imposed for such violations and the amount of such penalties collected; \par
\par
5.  For each inspection resulting in the issuance of a notice of violation: \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-450\li1170\qj 5.1. The name of the owner and the address of the building to which such notice of violation was issued; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-450\li1170\qj 5.2. The number and type of violations issued, disaggregated by whether such violations are upheld, pending or dismissed;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\qj\par
6.\tab For each inspection resulting in the issuance of a notice of violation pursuant to section 28-210.3:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-450\li1170\qj 6.1. Whether each such notice of violation was classified as immediately hazardous pursuant to item 16 of section 28-201.2.1;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-450\li1170\qj 6.2.  For each such immediately hazardous violation, whether the notice of violation was for the illegal conversion of more than one dwelling unit or for a second or subsequent offense; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li1080\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-450\li1170\qj 6.3. The number of notices of violation issued pursuant to section 28-210.3 to the building in the five years preceding the submission date of the report.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-360\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl480\slmult1\qj\expndtw-3\ulnone\tab\'a7 2.  \expndtw0 This local law takes effect immediately.  \par
